MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL63 postcode area of Ty Croes. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware at  9:07PM. Our engineers have arrived on site and confirmed the power cut has been caused by a fault on our electrical network. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 11:15PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10PM on Saturday 17th April 2021.
